languages.text: "Четвертый Складочный — бедный и неспокойный сектор. Но худшее, что от него можно ожидать — пьяные драки и проблемы с подпольной варкой ротгата. Раньше мы с ним справлялись. Справились бы и сейчас — если б на людей не давили так сильно. Также хочу отметить! Проблема не только в этом секторе. Он расположен на одной из самых заселенных нижних палуб, и все, что там происходит, влияет на всех соседей".

"Depot 4 is poor and troubled. But at worst that means drunken fights and illegal rotgut brewing. We have handled the workers of Depot 4 in the past. We would have done so again, if the crackdown on Depot 4 hadn't been so harsh. And another important point to bear in mind: the problem is not limited to this sector. It is located on one of the most populated lower decks, and everything that happens there has a knock-on effect on all the neighbouring sectors."
languages.original_text: "Четвертый Складочный — бедный и неспокойный сектор. Но худшее, что от него можно ожидать — пьяные драки и проблемы с подпольной варкой ротгата. Раньше мы с ним справлялись. languages.text: “四号货栈确实很穷，而且麻烦不断。但哪怕是最大的麻烦，也不过只是酒后打架或非法私酿烈酒。我们过去曾经处理过四号货栈工人的骚乱。而且，如果当时对四号货栈的惩处没有那么严厉的话，光靠我们就完全足以解决骚乱了。还有一点非常重要，希望您能记住：那里发生的问题，并不仅限那片区域。四号货栈位于人口最多的底层甲板之一。无论那里发生什么事情，都会对邻近区域产生连锁反应。”
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is poor and troubled. But at worst that means drunken fights and illegal rotgut brewing. We have handled the workers of Depot 4 in the past. We would have done so again, if the crackdown on Depot 4 hadn't been so harsh. And another important point to bear in mind: the problem is not limited to this sector. It is located on one of the most populated lower decks, and everything that happens there has a knock-on effect on all the neighbouring sectors."

traits.locale_text: “四号货栈确实很穷，而且麻烦不断。但哪怕是最大的麻烦，也不过只是酒后打架或非法私酿烈酒。我们过去曾经处理过四号货栈工人的骚乱。而且，如果当时对四号货栈的惩处没有那么严厉的话，光靠我们就完全足以解决骚乱了。还有一点非常重要，希望您能记住：那里发生的问题，并不仅限那片区域。四号货栈位于人口最多的底层甲板之一。无论那里发生什么事情，都会对邻近区域产生连锁反应。”

languages.text: «El Depósito 4 es un lugar pobre y problemático. Pero en el peor de los casos solo se producen peleas de borrachos y tráfico de licor ilegal. Ya hemos tenido que apaciguar a los trabajadores del Depósito 4 anteriormente y lo habríamos vuelto a hacer si no se hubiera tratado a sus habitantes con tanta dureza. Hay otro detalle que debo mencionar: el problema no se limita a ese sector. Está en una de las cubiertas inferiores más pobladas, y todo lo que sucede allí afecta a los sectores colindantes».
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is poor and troubled. But at worst that means drunken fights and illegal rotgut brewing. We have handled the workers of Depot 4 in the past. We would have done so again, if the crackdown on Depot 4 hadn't been so harsh. And another important point to bear in mind: the problem is not limited to this sector. It is located on one of the most populated lower decks, and everything that happens there has a knock-on effect on all the neighbouring sectors."

traits.locale_text: «El Depósito 4 es un lugar pobre y problemático. Pero en el peor de los casos solo se producen peleas de borrachos y tráfico de licor ilegal. Hay otro detalle que debo mencionar: el problema no se limita a ese sector. Está en una de las cubiertas inferiores más pobladas, y todo lo que sucede allí afecta a los sectores colindantes».

languages.text: 「第四倉庫は貧しく、問題を抱えています。ですが、最悪の場合、それは酔っ払いの喧嘩や違法な密造酒の醸造につながります。私たちは過去に第四倉庫の労働者に対応したことがあります。第四倉庫に対する取り締まりがそれほど厳しいものでなかったなら、今回もそうしていたでしょう。そして、もうひとつ肝に銘じておくべき重要な点は、問題はこのセクターに限ったことではないということです。そこは最も人口の多い下層甲板のひとつであり、そこで起こることはすべて、隣接するすべてのセクターに波及する可能性があるのです」
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is poor and troubled. But at worst that means drunken fights and illegal rotgut brewing. We have handled the workers of Depot 4 in the past. We would have done so again, if the crackdown on Depot 4 hadn't been so harsh. And another important point to bear in mind: the problem is not limited to this sector. It is located on one of the most populated lower decks, and everything that happens there has a knock-on effect on all the neighbouring sectors."

traits.locale_text: 「第四倉庫は貧しく、問題を抱えています。ですが、最悪の場合、それは酔っ払いの喧嘩や違法な密造酒の醸造につながります。私たちは過去に第四倉庫の労働者に対応したことがあります。第四倉庫に対する取り締まりがそれほど厳しいものでなかったなら、今回もそうしていたでしょう。そして、もうひとつ肝に銘じておくべき重要な点は、問題はこのセクターに限ったことではないということです。そこは最も人口の多い下層甲板のひとつであり、そこで起こることはすべて、隣接するすべてのセクターに波及する可能性があるのです」

languages.text: "Depot 4 ist arm und hat viele Probleme. Meist sind das aber nur Schlägereien zwischen Betrunkenen oder illegal gebrannter Schnaps. Wir haben uns bisher immer um die Arbeiter in Depot 4 gekümmert. Das hätten wir auch wieder getan, wenn das Vorgehen gegen Depot 4 nicht ganz so hart ausgefallen wäre. Und noch ein wichtiger Faktor: Das Problem ist nicht auf diesen Sektor beschränkt. Es ist in einem der am stärksten bevölkerten Unterdecks entstanden, und alles, was dort passiert, wirkt sich auch auf die benachbarten Sektoren aus."
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is poor and troubled. But at worst that means drunken fights and illegal rotgut brewing. We have handled the workers of Depot 4 in the past. We would have done so again, if the crackdown on Depot 4 hadn't been so harsh. And another important point to bear in mind: the problem is not limited to this sector. It is located on one of the most populated lower decks, and everything that happens there has a knock-on effect on all the neighbouring sectors."

languages.text: « La pauvreté et l'agitation sont le lot quotidien du dépôt 4, c'est vrai, mais à part des rixes entre ivrognes et la distillation illégale de tord-boyaux, nous n'avons pas à nous en plaindre. Nous avons déjà géré des situations comme celle-ci par le passé. Et cette fois encore, tout serait vite rentré dans l'ordre si seulement les représailles contre les ouvriers n'avaient pas été aussi brutales. Par ailleurs, j'attire votre attention sur le fait que le problème ne se limite pas à ce secteur précis. Il se trouve sur un des ponts inférieurs les plus peuplés du vaisseau. Tout ce qui s'y passe a forcément un impact sur les compartiments voisins. »
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is poor and troubled. But at worst that means drunken fights and illegal rotgut brewing. We have handled the workers of Depot 4 in the past. We would have done so again, if the crackdown on Depot 4 hadn't been so harsh. And another important point to bear in mind: the problem is not limited to this sector. It is located on one of the most populated lower decks, and everything that happens there has a knock-on effect on all the neighbouring sectors."

Nous avons déjà géré des situations comme celle-ci par le passé. Et cette fois encore, tout serait vite rentré dans l'ordre si seulement les représailles contre les ouvriers n'avaient pas été aussi brutales. Par ailleurs, j'attire votre attention sur le fait que le problème ne se limite pas à ce secteur précis. Il se trouve sur un des ponts inférieurs les plus peuplés du vaisseau. Tout ce qui s'y passe a forcément un impact sur les compartiments voisins. »

languages.text: "4. Depo, yoksul ve tasalı olsa da orada ayyaş kavgaları ya da yasa dışı groksöldüren imalinden fenası yaşanmamıştır. Geçmişte 4. Depo işçileriyle başa çıktığımız oldu. Yapılan müdahale bu denli sert olmasaydı yine başa çıkabilirdik. Önemli bir diğer nokta ise sorunun bu sektörle sınırlı olmaması. 4. Depo'nun bulunduğu yer, en yüksek nüfusa sahip alt güvertelerden biridir. Komşu sektörler de hâliyle olan bitenden etkileniyor."
languages.original_text: "Depot 4 is poor and troubled. But at worst that means drunken fights and illegal rotgut brewing. We have handled the workers of Depot 4 in the past. We would have done so again, if the crackdown on Depot 4 hadn't been so harsh. And another important point to bear in mind: the problem is not limited to this sector. It is located on one of the most populated lower decks, and everything that happens there has a knock-on effect on all the neighbouring sectors."

traits.locale_text: "Depo 4 yoksul ve sorunlu olsa da en kötü günlerinde ayyaş kavgaları ya da yasa dışı groksöldüren imali görülür. Geçmişte Depo 4 işçileriyle başa çıktığımız oldu. Depo 4'teki müdahale bu denli sert olmasaydı yine başa çıkabilirdik. Önemli bir diğer nokta ise sorunun bu sektörle sınırlı olmaması. Depo 4'ün yer aldığı konum, en yüksek nüfusa sahip alt güvertelerden biridir. Komşu sektörler de hâliyle olan bitenden etkileniyor."
